name: Boss Fight (yassinealoui)
description:
this game is a real test for your  boss fighting  skills!!you can fight one boss or two clones of it or challenge the gamer inside you and fight 10 bosses simultaneously!!!!

in old games you usually add equipements,weapons .. but in this game you will be able to add BOSSES! yes bosses !  C'mon Epic Gamer what are you waiting for !take this fight , this Boss Fight!  and post in comments your highest score!
